values.value: select Id, name, recordtypeId, Integration_Status__c , Customer_Status__c from account WHERE RecordType.DeveloperName IN ('Company_Account_RT', 'Partnership_Account_RT', 'Sole_Trader_Account_RT') and Integration_Status__c != 'Successful' and Integration_Status__c != 'Waiting Confirmation' and Customer_Status__c != 'Pending'
